articles.title: 'The Suicide Squad' underperformed at the box office. Here's why - CTV News
articles.description: 'The Suicide Squad,' a new, R-rated superhero film from Warner Bros., opened to an estimated US$26.5 million at the North American box office this weekend. That number came in under industry expectations, which projected the film to make around US$30 million.
